title: World on Fire, episode 2 review - an epic return to form for BBC Sunday night drama
text:
I keep finding myself singing the title of World On Fire (BBC One) to the tune of hippy anthem This Wheel’s On Fire, best known as the Absolutely Fabulous theme. The two shows couldn’t be much more different. There was little to laugh at but much to admire in this ambitious wartime drama.

Written by the brilliant Peter Bowker, its cleverly constructed narrative hopped around Europe to give an deeply humane view of historic events, through the eyes of individuals caught in the coming storm.
